title: Glyph of Warding
content:
lyph of Warding is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Glyph of Warding is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Abjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Baldur's Gate 3 Glyph of Warding Information

Description: Inscribe a circle of arcane glyphs on the ground. When stepped on by an enemy, the selected magical effect will trigger. Only one glyph can be active at a time. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Abjuration School
